OriginalText: I gotta share a room with your uncle.

Text: 感谢香缇，让我们能享受免费的度假！
OriginalText: Thanks to Shantae, we get an all-expenses paid vacation!
Remember, when you get on stage...

Text: …一定得想办法让那些精灵粉丝观众高兴！
OriginalText: ...you’d better do whatever it takes to pacify those genie-crazed throngs!

Text: 给他们留个好印象，我们明年才能再免费回来度假一次。
OriginalText: Make a good impression so we get a free trip again next year.

Text: 好啦，快去见见其他的表演者吧！
OriginalText: Now hurry up and meet your fellow performers!

Text: 通知她们表演快开始了！
OriginalText: Let them know that the show is starting soon!

Text: 这城市里有<1>五位半精灵</1>，所以你得尽快找出她们。
OriginalText: There are <1>FIVE HALF-GENIES</1> on this island, so you’d better find them fast.

Text: 市长在找你。你该去跟他谈话，尽快点。
OriginalText: The Mayor was looking for you. You should go and talk to him, pronto.

Text: 往这方向前往举世闻名的<1>沉没城市游览</1>!
OriginalText: This way to the world famous <1>SUNKEN CITY TOUR</1>!

Text: 如果你跟着旅行团，请不要分开，小心脚下！
OriginalText: If you are with a tour group, please stick together and watch your step!

Text: （不开玩笑，一摔有可能就完了）
OriginalText: (seriously, you might not survive the fall)

Text: 留心在这安家的调皮小虫和蝙蝠！
OriginalText: Mind the playful bugs and bats who call this place their home!

Text: 我想这可能是我第一次真正的度假，叔叔！
OriginalText: I think this might be my first real vacation, Uncle!
And it’s sure to be a memorable one!

Text: 这岛屿有很丰富的历史。
OriginalText: This island has a rich history.

Text: 它坐落在一座沉没的古老城市上…
OriginalText: It sits atop an ancient <1>SUNKEN CITY</1>...
...much of which is still intact today.

Text: 这种地方都是游客陷阱。
OriginalText: Places like this are all tourist traps.

Text: 他们总是找出有历史意义的某个地方…
OriginalText: They find a spot with historical significance...
...and laugh all the way to the bank.

Text: 但我倒总想看看这些古代的遗迹。
OriginalText: I've always wanted to see these old ruins.

Text: 现在香缇成为大明星了，我终于有机会了！
OriginalText: Now that Shantae's a big celebrity, I'll finally have my chance!

Text: 你保证过不会让我尴尬的！
OriginalText: You promised not to embarrass me!

Text: 我脚都麻了，提这么多包包！
OriginalText: My foot’s still asleep from carrying all the bags!

Text: 我带波罗去把住宿搞定。
OriginalText: I’ll take Bolo to secure our lodging.

Text: 你们看完风景再来跟上我们。
OriginalText: Catch up when you're finished gawking at the scenery.

Text: 我不会让任何事毁了我的第一次度假！
OriginalText: I won't let anything ruin my first vacation!

Text: 哎哟，我这把老骨头得休息休息。
OriginalText: Oof, these old bones need a rest.

Text: 欢迎来到举世闻名海底游览！
OriginalText: Welcome to the World Famous Undersea Tour!

Text: 请在存档进度之后再回来。
OriginalText: Please come back after you've <1>SAVED YOUR PROGRESS</1>!

Text: 欢迎来到<1>场馆镇</1>，半精灵庆典主场。
OriginalText: Welcome to <1>ARENA TOWN</1>, home of the Half-Genie Festival!

Text: 半精灵客人到了都得先跟市长报道。
OriginalText: All Half-Genie guests must check in with the Mayor upon arrival!
Thank you, and have a festive stay!
Please watch your step when exiting the resort area.

Text: 这岛上有许多凶恶的怪兽！
OriginalText: This island is home to many hostile monsters!
Thank you, and have a festive stay!
This area is off limits for now.

Text: 对此给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意！

OriginalText: All the way from Scuttle Town!
You can call me the Mayor!
It is my greatest pleasure to host this event...

Text: 我主办这庆典是为了表达对像你一样少见、神奇的人物的赏识。
OriginalText: I created the festival to demonstrate my appreciation of rare, magical beings like yourself.

Text: 我想要世界各地的人都能亲自目睹这份神奇！
OriginalText: I want people from all over the world to witness the magic firsthand!

Text: 这样人们才能更了解他们的半人、半精灵邻居！
OriginalText: That way they can better understand their half-human, half-genie neighbors!

Text: 这美丽的岛屿是个很棒的活动举办地！
OriginalText: This beautiful island makes a dandy backdrop for the event!

Text: 你好！你一定就是香缇的叔叔！
OriginalText: Hello! And you must be Shantae's uncle!

Text: 是啊，我们招来了不少人！
OriginalText: Why yes, we have managed to muster quite a crowd!

Text: 当然，大部分收入被用以支持当地商业…
OriginalText: Of course most of the ticket money goes to support local businesses...

Text: …以及给我们的半精灵明星提供免费飞机票和旅馆住宿！
OriginalText: ...and provides a free flight and hotel stay for each of our Half-Genie super stars!

Text: …她们答应做我<1>盛大演出</1>的<1>明星</1>…
OriginalText: ...they agree to be the <1>STARS</1> in my <1>GRAND PERFORMANCE</1>...

Text: 所以，我想让你今晚就上台参与试演！
OriginalText: That's why I want you up on that stage for the sneak-peek preview event - tonight!
I don't even know the routine yet.
It's just a dry run after all!
You know, a practice performance in front of a live audience!
Something to work the kinks out!

Text: 我也请了另外<1>五</1>位半精灵跟你一起表演！
OriginalText: I've invited <1>FIVE</1> other Half-Genies to perform with you!

Text: 她们现在已经在岛上了。
OriginalText: They're here on the island now.

Text: 你能不能帮我去找她们？
然后提醒她们今晚演出的事？
OriginalText: And remind them about tonight's big show?
I can't wait to meet them!
Find the <1>FIVE</1> other Half-Genies for the Mayor!

Text: 在<1>子屏幕</1>能找到像那个<1>清单</1>之类的道具。
OriginalText: Items like that <1>CHECKLIST</1> can be found on your <1>SUBSCREEN</1>.

Text: 如果忘记要做什么，打开<1>子屏幕</1>翻看道具找出提示。
OriginalText: If you ever forget what to do, open the <1>SUBSCREEN</1> and browse through your items for hints.

Text: 现在先去跟岛上<1>全部五位半精灵</1>自我介绍！
OriginalText: For now, please introduce yourself to <1>ALL FIVE HALF-GENIES</1> on the island!

Text: 演出快开始了！其他人已经在后台了！快一点！
OriginalText: The show’s about to start! The others are already backstage! Please hurry!

Text: 我真的感觉这里有点怪。
OriginalText: I definitely sense something odd in this place.

Text: 我来这岛屿是为了表演庆典节目。
OriginalText: I came to this island to perform in the festival.

Text: 但是认识薇拉之后，我的半精灵感官开始混乱了。
OriginalText: But since meeting Vera, my Half-Genie senses keep going nuts.
Well... I'd better head back to Arena Town.

Text: 记得见见其他的半精灵哦！
OriginalText: Make sure you meet the other Half-Genies!

Text: 你见到全部的<1>半精灵</1>了吗？表演快开始了。快去跟市长报告！
OriginalText: You’ve met all the <1>HALF-GENIES</1>? The show is starting soon. You’d better report back to the mayor!
Are you one of the Half-Genies...?
My town is right here on the island!

Text: 来了这么多观光客，我们通常都躲起来。
OriginalText: With all the tourists around, my people tend to keep hidden away.

Text: 但我想支持我的半精灵同伴们，让我的<1>恢复</1>魔法派上用场。
OriginalText: But I wanted to support my fellow Half-Genies and put my <1>REFRESH</1> magic to good use.

Text: 谁想得到有那么多种魔法呢？
OriginalText: Who knew there were so many different forms of magic?

Text: 在今晚的演出里你能全部看到！
OriginalText: You'll get to see them all in tonight's big show!
It was very nice to meet you!

Text: 记得跟其他半精灵自我介绍哦！
OriginalText: Be certain to introduce yourself to the other Half-Genies!

Text: 你见到全部的<1>半精灵</1>了吗？表演快开始了。快去跟市长报告！
OriginalText: You’ve met all the <1>HALF-GENIES</1>? The show is starting soon. You’d better report back to the mayor!

Text: 我是从遥远的天窗镇飞来的！
OriginalText: I flew in all the way from Scuttle Town!

Text: 你对这岛屿有什么印象呢？
OriginalText: So what do you think of this island?

Text: 当然了，怎么会是假的呢？
我有点想插上这里的接线柱。
OriginalText: I'm half tempted to plug into one of these terminals.

Text: 观察一下电线是不是接回到一位富人的豪宅。
OriginalText: See if the power lines run back to some rich guy's mansion or something.

Text: 随便吧。你的能力是什么？
比如说，锁着的门的钥匙？
OriginalText: Like a key to a locked door?
Gosh, I never even thought of that...

Text: 那比如呢？像是肌肉超人，或者会喷火的龙呢？
OriginalText: Then what, like a muscly superhero or a fire-breathing dragon or something?

Text: 呃，我通常会变成猴子爬来爬去。
OriginalText: Um, usually I turn into a monkey and climb around.
That’s not what I would choose.
Ok, well don’t be late for the performance.

Text: 要记得见见其他半精灵哦！
OriginalText: Make sure you meet the other Half-Genies!

Text: 你见到全部的<1>半精灵</1>了吗？表演快开始了。快去跟市长报告！
OriginalText: You’ve met all the <1>HALF-GENIES</1>? The show is starting soon. You’d better report back to the mayor!

Text: 香缇！很高兴终于见到了你！
OriginalText: Shantae! It’s so nice to finally meet you!

Text: 我叫<1>哈莫尼</1>，是半精灵之中最年长的。
OriginalText: I’m <1>HARMONY</1>, the oldest of the Half-Genies.

Text: 是的，我是第一个人类父亲和精灵母亲的孩子。
OriginalText: Yes, I was the <1>VERY FIRST</1> to be born of a human father and a genie mother.

Text: 你看起来太年轻了，和最年长完全搭不上边！
OriginalText: You look too young to be the oldest anything!

Text: 半精灵其实也没存在了多久。
OriginalText: Half-Genies haven't been around all that long!
We exist as a generation of one!

Text: 所以，除非精灵们有一天回来……
OriginalText: So unless the Genies return someday...

Text: ……我们之后就不会再有其他半精灵了，对吧？
OriginalText: ...there won't be any more Half-Genies to follow after us, will there?
Gosh! I never thought of that.

Text: …我们得尽力去留下我们的印记，你不觉得吗？
OriginalText: ...We must do our <1>VERY BEST</1> to make a difference in this world, don't you think?
We can talk more after the show.

Text: 记得永远要尽全力，好吗？
OriginalText: Just remember to always give it your best, ok?

Text: 我没有说可疑，我只是问一问。
OriginalText: I didn't say it was, I’m just asking.
Why, is there such a thing?

Text: 嘿。你得快去找出其他像我这样的半精灵！
OriginalText: Heh. Better go find all the other Half-Genies, like me!

Text: 你得快去找出其他像我这样的半精灵！
OriginalText: Better go find all the other Half-Genies, like me!

Text: 其他半精灵都已经在后台了！请尽快！
OriginalText: The others are already backstage! Please hurry!

Text: 演出快开始了！其他人已经在后台了！请快点！
OriginalText: The show’s about to start! The others are already backstage! Please hurry!
You haven't saved your game yet!

Text: 请存档后再来跟我谈话。
OriginalText: Please come talk to me after you've saved.

Text: 你不觉得你把时间掐得太紧了吗？

OriginalText: This is supposed to be a practice show!
Why are the stands so packed?!

Text: 你们最擅长半精灵魔法了。
OriginalText: Half-Genie magic is what you're best at.
It's what these people came to see.
I'd better <1>REPORT BACK TO THE MAYOR</1>!

Text: 你担心我也会消失，是吗？
OriginalText: You're worried that I'll disappear too, is that it?

Text: 你能想象孤身一人的感觉吗？
OriginalText: Can you imagine what it’s like being the only one left behind?

Text: 我不能躲在屋里什么都不做啊！
OriginalText: I can’t hide indoors and do nothing!

Text: 那些女孩不会自己回来的。
OriginalText: Those girls are not coming back.

Text: 这岛上发生了很奇怪的事！
OriginalText: Something weird is happening on this island!
And I'm going to find out what it is!
And I'm going to get one!
And don't get me started about Uncle and Sky!

Text: 甚至波罗也跟他们一伙！
OriginalText: Even Bolo is on their side!

Text: 我怎么可能就这么等着让市长去调查呢？
OriginalText: How can I just lie low while the Mayor looks into this?

Text: 我也许不是这个岛屿的<1>守护精灵</1>……
OriginalText: I may not be the <1>GUARDIAN GENIE</1> of this island...
I don’t care what anyone says!

Text: 女孩们不会在观众众目睽睽前凭空消失！
OriginalText: Girls don't just vanish in full view of an entire audience!
...And I'm going to get to the <1>VERY BOTTOM</1> of it!
What are you doing down here?
I might ask you the same question!
You're staying out of trouble, I hope?

Text: 啊，我想我们反正被困了有一会儿了……
OriginalText: Well, I figured since we're stuck here for a while...

Text: 为何不享受一下沉没城市游览呢？
OriginalText: Why not enjoy the Sunken City tour?

Text: 我真想看这岛屿其他的部分。
OriginalText: Yessir, I’d sure like to see the rest of this place.

Text: 真可惜那么大一部分都被封住了。
OriginalText: It’s a shame that so much of it is sealed off!

Text: 但我想毕竟还是安全第一。
OriginalText: But I suppose safety must come first, after all.

Text: 导游说即使拿起<1>一块石头</1>都能引起塌方。
OriginalText: The tour guide said that removing even a <1>SINGLE STONE BLOCK</1> could be enough to cause a cave in.

Text: 整个城市，就塌在我们头上！
OriginalText: With the entire town, right above us!
Now what is all this now?

Text: 哎哟，我想我撞伤了我的屁股。
OriginalText: Ooof, I think I bruised my bum.

Text: 叔叔，你在上面听得见吗？
OriginalText: Uncle can you hear me up there?

Text: 一定是沉没城市中更古老的那部分!
OriginalText: I must be in an older part of the Sunken City!
Even deeper down than the tour!

Text: 险险一定就是用了这些隧道把半精灵拐走的！
OriginalText: Risky must've used these tunnels to spirit the Half-Genies away!
I’d better search high and low for clues!

Text: 半精灵矮子！没想到会在这里见到你！
OriginalText: The Half-Genie runt! Fancy meeting you here!

Text: 我知道你做了什么，险险！
OriginalText: I know what you did, Risky!

Text: 你必须释放那些女孩，要不然你就完蛋了！
OriginalText: You'd better release those girls, or else!
You just have all the answers, don't you?

Text: 你也活不到干扰我的计划的那天了！
OriginalText: You won't live long enough to interfere with my plans!

Text: 你若<1>真的</1>想知道是谁抓走那些女孩…
OriginalText: If you want to know who <1>REALLY</1> captured those girls...
You won't have to look very far.
How did you get down here?
I’ll get you out of there!

Text: 它能让你<1>瞬间变形</1>成新的形态！
OriginalText: It will allow you to <1>TRANSFORM INSTANTLY</1> into a new form!

Text: 这枚上有<1>快冲水蜥</1>的符号！
OriginalText: This one bears the mark of a <1>DASH NEWT</1>!

Text: 快冲水蜥是岛上的稀有生物。
OriginalText: Dash Newts are rare creatures that inhabit the island.

Text: 也许你能使用它的能力去找出这地方的<1>邪恶之源</1>！
OriginalText: Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!
I promise to do my very best!
If you <1>DASH INTO A WALL</1>, you can stick to it!

Text: 点按 <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> 来快冲！若朝墙壁快冲，可以粘住它！试试看！
OriginalText: Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to <1>DASH</1>! If you <1>DASH INTO A WALL</1>, you can stick to it! Give it a shot!

Text: 按 <IB action=Dash /> <1>快冲</1>。在快冲时，你甚至可以<1>粘住墙壁</1>!
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Dash /> to <1>DASH</1>. While dashing, you can even <1>STICK TO WALLS</1>!

Text: 点按 <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> 来快冲！若朝墙壁快冲，可以粘住它！试试看！
OriginalText: Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to <1>DASH</1>! If you <1>DASH INTO A WALL</1>, you can stick to it! Give it a shot!

Text: 岛屿官方交代你要保持安全！
OriginalText: The island officials told you to stay safe!

Text: 我不想再说一遍，别凑热闹！
OriginalText: For the last time, stay out of this!

Text: 哇，你关于<1>水蜥</1>魔法的说法是对的！
OriginalText: Boy, you sure were right about that <1>NEWT</1> magic!

Text: 我从来没想到能这样变形！
OriginalText: I never knew I could transform like that!

Text: 哈莫尼说当我们一起合作时，什么都能做得到！
OriginalText: Harmony says that when we work together, we can do anything!

Text: 所以假如我们<1>把魔法结合起来</1>呢？
OriginalText: So what if we <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1>?

Text: 是从<1>融合石</1>锻造出来的。
融合石就来自这个岛屿。
OriginalText: Fusion Stones come from right here on the island.

Text: 就那么一点，像那块硬币里的，给了你水蜥的能力。
OriginalText: A tiny amount, like what's in that coin, gave you the abilities of a newt.

Text: 但假如我们有<1>一整块融合石</1>…
OriginalText: But if we had an <1>ENTIRE FUSION STONE</1>...

Text: 我猜我就能把<1>我所有的能力</1>传给你！
OriginalText: I bet I could give <1>ALL OF MY POWERS</1> to you!

Text: 你不能就这样把你的魔法给我！
OriginalText: You can't just give your magic away!

Text: 我们把所有魔法融合成一个…
OriginalText: We'll merge our magic into one big...

Text: 我们把这些妖怪消灭掉…
…然后结束了之后你就可以把魔法还给我。
OriginalText: ...And you can give the magic back when you're done.

Text: 找到一块<1>融合石</1>然后去<1>场馆镇</1>找我。
OriginalText: Find a <1>FUSION STONE</1> and meet me in <1>ARENA TOWN</1>.

Text: 还有记住，如果你忘了接下去该去哪……
OriginalText: And remember... if you ever forget where to go next...
I'll be waiting for your answer <1>BACKSTAGE</1>!
Bolo! What are you doing all the way up here?

Text: 你和天天拿到有游泳池的房间！
OriginalText: You and Sky got the room with the pool!

Text: 你知道你们游泳池里游什么？
OriginalText: You know what swims in your pool?

Text: 你知道这里游泳池里游什么？
OriginalText: You know what swims in the pool over here?

Text: 而且我开始怀疑这根本不是游泳池！
OriginalText: And I'm starting to think it's not even a pool!

Text: 水又浑又闻起来像芥末！
OriginalText: The water is thick and smells like mustard!

Text: 我刚去泡了泡，出来后发现脚上就粘了个东西！
OriginalText: I went for a dip, and when I got out there was a thing on my foot!
I am a deep sea explorer!

Text: 我的任务是和我的团队研究这岛屿的历史。
OriginalText: My mission is to study the history of this island with my crew.

Text: 我们的船，<1>铁鱼</1>，是个深海<1>潜水器</1>。
OriginalText: Our vessel, the <1>METAL FISH</1>, is a deep sea <1>SUBMERSIBLE</1>.

Text: 它在岛屿东岸某个海沟附近靠岸。
OriginalText: It's docked near a trench off the island's East side.

Text: 我想了解沉没城市的<1>起源之谜</1>！
OriginalText: I want to learn the <1>SECRET ORIGINS</1> of the Sunken City!

Text: 我需要<1>两只节肢动物</1>才能继续我的研究。
OriginalText: To continue my research, I require <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1>!

Text: 一只来自岛屿<1>西边</1>高处的污水池…
OriginalText: One from the high elevation cesspools on the island's <1>WEST SIDE</1>...

Text: 然后再一只来自海面，最好从<1>东边</1>。
OriginalText: And another collected from sea level, ideally from the <1>EAST SIDE</1>.

Text: 你不用问我，我分得清东和西！
OriginalText: And before you ask, I do know my East from my West!

Text: 如果你能找到<1>两只节肢动物</1>，请带来给我！
OriginalText: If you find <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1>, please bring them to me!

Text: 我需要<1>两只节肢动物</1>才能继续我的研究。
OriginalText: I need <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1> to continue my research!

Text: 一只来自岛屿<1>西边</1>高处的污水池…
OriginalText: One from the high elevation cesspools on the island's <1>WEST SIDE</1>...

Text: 然后再一只来自海面，最好从<1>东边</1>。
OriginalText: And another collected from sea level, ideally from the <1>EAST SIDE</1>.

Text: 如果你找到了，请带给我！
OriginalText: If you find them, bring them!

Text: 哦！你把<1>两只节肢动物</1>带来给我了！
OriginalText: Oh! You brought me <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1>!
May I have both of them?
Oh phoo! But I need them!

Text: 请找到<1>两只</1>之后再回来！
OriginalText: Please return when you have <1>TWO OF THEM</1>!

Text: 两只来自非常不同的海拔的生物…
OriginalText: How could two creatures discovered at wildy different elevations...

Text: 这暗示了这岛屿过去发生过剧烈的变动！
OriginalText: It suggests that the island itself has suffered a turbulent past!

Text: 也许是火山活动造成了城市沉没！
OriginalText: Perhaps volcanic activity caused the city to sink!

Text: 然后因此，从地底喷出的奇异石头…
OriginalText: And as a result, the island was showered by strange rocks...
...which were belched skyward from deep within the belly of the Earth!
You can go ahead and keep that.

Text: 谢谢你对我研究的帮助！
OriginalText: Thank you for helping me with my research!
And please pay a visit to the <1>METAL FISH</1> sometime!
Pay a visit to the <1>METAL FISH</1> sometime!

Text: 垃圾桶里什么都没有，除了橘子皮和口香糖。
OriginalText: Nothing left in the trashcan but orange peels and gum.

Text: 你如果遇到医生，给他看<1>垃圾桶里的那个东西</1>!
OriginalText: If you happen to see a doctor, show them that <1>THING FROM THE TRASHCAN</1>!

Text: 希望我不会变成一个跳动的大脓包！
OriginalText: Hope I don't turn into a gigantic, throbbing pustule!

Text: 有了它，我们就能<1>结合我们的魔法</1>，救出哈莫尼和其他人！
OriginalText: With it, we'll be able to <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1> and save Harmony and the others!

Text: 有了它，我们就能<1>结合我们的魔法</1>，救出哈莫尼和其他人！
OriginalText: With it, we'll be able to <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1> and save Harmony and the others!

Text: 你准备好<1>融合我们的魔法</1>了吗？
OriginalText: Are you ready to try <1>MERGING OUR MAGIC</1>?

Text: 别动……来结合我们的魔法吧！
OriginalText: Hold still... It's time to combine our magic!

Text: <1>扫描舞</1>能显现出肉眼观察不到的东西！
OriginalText: The <1>SEER DANCE</1> can reveal things that are otherwise invisible to the naked eye!

Text: （跳舞直到图标出现，再按<IB action=Left/>启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Left/> to activate the magic!)

OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: 为何不在这房间里试试看呢？
OriginalText: Why not try testing it in this room?

Text: 我相信<1>扫描舞</1>能帮助你的探险！
OriginalText: I'm certain that the <1>SEER DANCE</1> will help you on your quest!
Just remember to try it everywhere!

Text: （跳舞时，按下<IB action=Left/>就能启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (While dancing, press  <IB action=Left/> to activate the magic!)

OriginalText: (While dancing, touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: 为何不在这房间里试试看呢？
OriginalText: Why not try testing it in this room?

Text: 我相信<1>扫描舞</1>能帮助你的探险！
OriginalText: I'm certian that the <1>SEER DANCE</1> will help you on your quest!
Just remember to try it everywhere!

Text: （跳舞时，按下<IB action=Left/>就能启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (While dancing, press  <IB action=Left/> to activate the magic!)

Text: （跳舞时，点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (While dancing, touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)
What are you doing behind the wall?

Text: 自从你掉到不知道哪里去，我一直都在找你！
OriginalText: I've been looking for you ever since you fell from sight!

Text: 也许能帮你找到那些女孩。
OriginalText: It might help you find those girls.
There's an opening in the wall here.

Text: 人们多年来都使用它来解决水的谜题。
OriginalText: Folks have been using them to solve water-themed puzzles for years.

Text: 是的，我还在。只是开个玩笑。
OriginalText: Yeah, I'm here. Just kidding with you.

Text: 叔叔，你该回到地面上，那里比较安全。
OriginalText: Uncle, you should go back up to the surface, where it's safe.
But first, you should look through this hole again.
Okay... what am I looking for?
Ha ha, I blew in your eye.

Text: 来，如果你看到哪里有卖吃的拿这去用。
OriginalText: Here, use this to get lunch if you see a place.

Text: 那<1>阀门手柄</1>也许能操纵附近的机关！
OriginalText: That <1>VALVE HANDLE</1> probably operates some mechanism nearby!

Text: 祝你探险好运！快去找出那四位消失的半精灵！
OriginalText: Good luck on your <1>QUEST</1>! Find those four missing Half-Genies!

Text: 看起来好像缺了什么东西。
你是怎么找到我们村的？
OriginalText: How did you find our village?
She was taken away by those <1>THINGS</1>.

Text: 多年来，我的人民都不得不躲起来.
OriginalText: For years, my people have been forced to hide.
They hide inside the ghostly fog...
Forget your troubles for a time.

Text: 我再也看不见我女儿薇拉了。
OriginalText: I will never see my daughter Vera again.

Text: 这位小姐证明了她<1>心中有真正的希望</1>!
OriginalText: This young lady has proven that she carries <1>TRUE HOPE IN HER HEART</1>!

Text: 她奇异、扭动的动作显示出一种<1>特别的快乐</1>！
OriginalText: There is a <1>SPECIAL JOY</1> to be found in her strange, wiggly movements!

Text: 这快乐能给我们<1>明天的希望</1>…
OriginalText: A joy that gives us <1>HOPE FOR TOMORROW</1>...

Text: …甚至能超越严格的<1>内容分级限制</1>…
…但最重要的是给了我们<1>面对恐惧</1>…
OriginalText: ...But most of all it gives us <1>COURAGE TO FACE OUR FEARS</1>!
I must go and tell the others!
I must not mourn my daughter!

Text: 我在我<1>内心深处</1>能感受到！
OriginalText: I can feel it <1>DEEP IN MY HEART</1>!

Text: 谢谢你给了我<1>希望</1>这份礼物！
OriginalText: Thank you for this gift of <1>HOPE</1>!
It was a gift to me from my own father!

Text: 但我认为<1>你</1>会<1>为它找出用途</1>。
OriginalText: But I believe that <1>YOU</1> will <1>GIVE IT ONE</1>.

Text: 给那个<1>无用品</1>找出好的用途！
OriginalText: Put that <1>USELESS OBJECT</1> to good use!

Text: 也许可以试着在<1>子屏幕</1>读它的<1>说明</1>!
OriginalText: Maybe try reading its <1>DESCRIPTION</1> on the <1>SUBSCREEN</1>!

Text: 你把我女儿带回来了，我会永远感谢你。谢谢！
OriginalText: I am forever grateful to you for returning my daughter. Thank you!

Text: 她到底在这岛上做什么？
OriginalText: What in the world is she doing on this island?

Text: 如果那些场馆镇傻子不愿意开这舱口…
OriginalText: If those Arena Town fools won't open this hatch willingly...

Text: 没有人能抗拒靴子险险，七海之女王！
OriginalText: No one defies Risky Boots, Queen of the Seven Seas!
Move it before it blows, you fools!

Text: <1>绝对的力量</1>马上就会属于我了！
OriginalText: It won't be long before <1>ABSOLUTE POWER</1> belongs to me!

Text: 我最好得跟着她，看看她在搞什么！
OriginalText: I'd better follow and see what she's up to!
So you weren't behind the abductions after all.

Text: 那一定就是我之前看到的那个<1>植物</1>干的。
OriginalText: Then it must have been that <1>PLANT THING</1> I saw before.

Text: 可是那到底是什么东西？其他人呢？
OriginalText: But what in the world was it? And where are the others?

Text: 你是在请靴子险险，<1>七海之女王</1>…
OriginalText: Are you asking Risky Boots, the <1>QUEEN OF THE SEVEN SEAS</1>...

Text: 这岛真正的王不是陆上的傻大个。
OriginalText: The true rulers of this island are not the land lubbers up above.

Text: …还有她们从不提及的<1>那一个</1>。
OriginalText: ...and <1>THE ONE</1> of whom they will not speak.
If you wish to save your friends...

Text: 你得<1>毁灭掉全部七个海妖</1>!

OriginalText: You'll have to get past me!

Text: 我来到这岛屿不是为了抓你的朋友。
OriginalText: I didn't come to this island to capture your friends.

Text: 随那些海妖对她们做什么。
OriginalText: Those Sirens can do whatever they want with them.

Text: 我来是为了<1>真正的宝藏</1>!

OriginalText: What in the world is she talking about?

Text: 我的天啊！我是睡着了吗？
等一下，我会把你救出来的！
OriginalText: Hold on. I’ll get you out of there!

Text: 看来这监狱是设计成让你昏迷的。
OriginalText: Seems like this prison was designed to put you under.

Text: 有点晕头转向，但应该没事吧。
OriginalText: A bit disoriented, but fine otherwise.
Thanks much bunches for coming to my rescue!

Text: 它能让你<1>瞬间变形</1>成新的形态！
OriginalText: It will allow you to <1>TRANSFORM INSTANTLY</1> into a new form!
This one bears the mark of a <1>GASTRO DRILL</1>!

Text: 钻蟹是住在土里爱打洞的生物。
OriginalText: Gastro Drills are burrowing creatures who move through the dirt!

Text: 也许你能使用它的能力去找出这地方的<1>邪恶之源</1>！
OriginalText: Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!
I promise to do my very best!

Text: 使用<IB action=LSTICK/>朝着<1>软平面</1>移动就能钻！试试看！
OriginalText: Press against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> with <IB action=LSTICK/> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!

Text: 朝着<1>软平面</1>移动就能<1>钻</1>！试试看！
OriginalText: Move against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!

Text: 使用<IB action=LSTICK/>朝着<1>软平面</1>移动就能钻！试试看！
OriginalText: Press against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> with <IB action=LSTICK/> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!

Text: 朝着<1>软平面</1>移动就能<1>钻</1>!试试看！
OriginalText: Move against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!

Text: 不好意思！村长命令把<1>舞堂</1>关了！
OriginalText: I'm sorry! The <1>DANCE PARLOR</1> is closed by order of the <1>CHIEF</1>!

Text: 可以帮我们去跟他说说话吗？
OriginalText: Would you talk to him for us?
There will be time for more dancing later!

Text: 现在，先跟<1>村长</1>分享你的<1>希望</1>!
OriginalText: For now, please share your <1>HOPE</1> with our <1>CHIEF</1>!
The <1>DANCE PARLOR</1> is open to all!

Text: 音乐开始时，就<1>扭起你的屁股</1>！
OriginalText: When the music starts, the <1>TURBULENT HIP-SHAKING</1> begins!

Text: <1>摆个pose</1>，看看你能不能打到上面的<1>面具目标</1>！
OriginalText: <1>STRIKE A POSE</1> and see if you can hit <1>MASK SHAPED TARGETS</1> up above!

Text: 越大的面具表示<1>越大的奖品</1>!
我们来看看你的技术吧！
<temp>你要玩几轮？越多轮次，越多折扣！</temp>
OriginalText: <temp>How many rounds will you play? More rounds, bigger savings!</temp>
You dance in such a weird and wonderful way!

Text: 我感受了到你<1>内心真正的希望</1>!
OriginalText: I sense <1>TRUE HOPE IN YOUR HEART</1>!

Text: 告诉<1>村长</1>他不能再忧心忡忡的了！
OriginalText: Tell the <1>CHIEF</1> he must worry no more!

Text: 有空再来跟我们一起跳舞！
<1>十颗宝石</1>就能再来一轮！如何？
OriginalText: <1>10 GEMS</1> for another round! How 'bout it?
Is there no way to open it?

Text: 这<1>无用品</1>上的形状和舱口上的标记一致！
OriginalText: Shapes on this <1>USELESS OBJECT</1> match the markings on this hatch!
Off to find his own room.

Text: 哇，你对<1>钻</1>魔法的说法是对的!
OriginalText: Boy, you were spot on about that <1>DRILL</1> magic!

Text: 我从来不知道我能像那样变形呢！
OriginalText: I never knew I could transform like that!

Text: 哈莫尼说当我们一起合作时，什么都能做得到！
OriginalText: Harmony says that when we work together, we can do anything!
She's safe, back in Arena Town!
What about Harmony, and the others?

Text: 我只希望有我的<1>幸运护身符</1>的帮助。
OriginalText: I only wish I had the help of my <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>.
I used to wear it around my neck.
But once while I was swimming...
That was the end of that.

Text: 我如果有我的<1>幸运护身符</1>，我就可以帮你找出其他人！
OriginalText: If I had that <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>, I could help you find the others!

Text: 如果你找到它，把它带到<1>树村</1>给我。
OriginalText: If you find it, bring it to me in <1>TREE TOWN</1>.
It's all up to you now! Good luck!

Text: 我没想到这里会有其他人！
OriginalText: I didn't expect to see other people down here!

Text: 我是一名科学家，来自<1>铁鱼</1>。
OriginalText: I am a scientist from the <1>METAL FISH</1>.
Right now I am testing a theory.
When a mermaid's days come to an end...
Its shells fall to the ocean floor.

Text: 时间推移，这些贝壳<1>沉入海床</1>成为化石。
OriginalText: Over time, the shells <1>SINK INTO THE SEA BED</1> to become fossils.

Text: 这些化石将会彻底地证明美人鱼戴的贝壳到底是来自别的生物……
OriginalText: Do mermaids wear shells taken from other creatures...

Text: 还是出生时就有的，就像某种外骨骼。
OriginalText: Or are the shells part of a mermaid exoskeleton, there from birth?
I for one believe in the latter!

Text: 你若能带来<1>六个美人鱼贝壳</1>…
OriginalText: If you can bring me <1>SIX MERMAID SHELLS</1>...

Text: …我就会有足够的数据证明我<1>非常重要的理论</1>。
OriginalText: ...I will have the data I need to prove my <1>VERY IMPORTANT THEORY</1>.

Text: 你可以在<1>最深的海底沙漠</1>找到。
OriginalText: You'll find Mermaid Shells in the <1>DEEPEST PART OF THE OCEAN SANDS</1>.

Text: 我会在你的<1>地图</1>上标出位置!
OriginalText: I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!

Text: 带<1>六个美人鱼贝壳</1>给我!
试着在<1>最深的地方</1><1>钻探</1>。
我会在你的<1>地图</1>上标出位置!
OriginalText: I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!

Text: 哦！你找到<1>美人鱼贝壳</1>了!

OriginalText: Did you bring me <1>SIX</1> of them?
Looks like you're still missing some!

Text: 我从你的<1>子屏幕</1>的<1>关键道具</1>部分就看得出来。
OriginalText: I could tell just by looking at the <1>KEY ITEMS</1> portion of your <1>SUBSCREEN</1>.

Text: 但我需要它们来进行我的研究！
OriginalText: But I need them for my research!

Text: 终于，我能用这些数据验证我的理论了！
OriginalText: At last, I can use this data to test my theory!
These shells came from a <1>SEA COW</1>!
And by the look of it....
All six came from the same cow.

Text: 麻烦你了，我还是给你点小谢礼吧。
OriginalText: I probably owe you something for your trouble.

Text: 这是我在海底找到的东西。
OriginalText: Something I found on the ocean floor.

Text: 你留着这个<1>幸运护身符</1>吧，麻烦你了。
OriginalText: You can keep that <1>LUCKY AMULET</1> for your troubles.

Text: 你留着这个<1>幸运护身符</1>吧，麻烦你了。
OriginalText: You can keep that <1>LUCKY AMULET</1> for your troubles.

Text: 我在这下面绕来绕去了好几个小时！
OriginalText: I've been wandering around down here for hours!

Text: 这下面有<1>海妖</1>，叔叔！你得马上回到安全地区！
OriginalText: There are <1>SIRENS</1> down here, uncle! You need to get to safety right away!

Text: 好，好，我可以自己回到<1>场馆镇/1>。
OriginalText: Fine, fine. I can find my way back to <1>ARENA TOWN</1> from here.

Text: 我可以自己回到<1>场馆镇</1>。你继续吧。
OriginalText: I can find my way back to <1>ARENA TOWN</1> from here. You go on ahead.

Text: 你能想象到，我爸看到我真是高兴坏了。
OriginalText: As you can imagine, my father was overjoyed to see me.

Text: 我从来没看他那么开心过！
OriginalText: I've honestly never seen him so happy!

Text: 但可惜还是没找到我的<1>幸运护身符</1>。
OriginalText: Unfortunately there's still no sign of my <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>.

Text: 但愿能把它找回来，我就能帮你救出其他半精灵！
OriginalText: If only I had it back, I could help you rescue the others!

Text: 但可惜还是没找到我的<1>幸运护身符</1>。
OriginalText: Unfortunately there's still no sign of my <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>.

Text: 但愿能把它找回来，我就能帮你救出其他半精灵！
OriginalText: If only I had it back, I could help you rescue the others!

Text: 你找到我的<1>幸运护身符</1>了！
我的护身符是在岛上制作的。
OriginalText: My amulet was crafted on this island.

Text: 有了它，我们就能<1>融合我们魔法</1>，救出哈莫尼和其他半精灵！
OriginalText: With it, we'll be able to <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1> and save Harmony and the others!

Text: <1>恢复舞</1>能疗养伤口，但也可以为其他人<1>恢复生命</1>！
OriginalText: The <1>REFRESH DANCE</1> can heal your wounds, but it can also <1>BRING LIFE</1> to others!

Text: （跳舞直到图标出现，再按<IB action=Up/>启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Up/> to activate the magic!)

Text: 何不在这房间里试试看？
OriginalText: Why not try using it in this room?

Text: （跳舞直到图标出现，再点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_refresh scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_refresh scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: 何不在这房间里试试看？
OriginalText: Why not try using it in this room?

Text: 我相信<1>恢复舞</1>能帮你保持健康！
OriginalText: I'm certain that the <1>REFRESH DANCE</1> will keep you healthy!

Text: 记得也在别的东西上试试！
OriginalText: Be sure to try it on other things as well!

Text: （跳舞直到图标出现，再按<IB action=Up/>启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Up/> to activate the magic!)

Text: （跳舞直到图标出现，再点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_refresh scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_refresh scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: 您刚做了什么，好先生或好女士！
OriginalText: What was that just now my good sir or madame!

Text: 我完完全全清醒了。我好想骑着儿童车一路滑到星星上！
OriginalText: I'm so completely awake, I feel like waterskiing on a baby’s bicycle straight to the stars!

Text: 那些孩子在下面多久了？
OriginalText: How long have the lads and lass been down there?

Text: 我得把马上启动绞车把他们拉上来！
OriginalText: I’ve got to run the winch and haul them up now!
Do not pass Joe do not collect rent as they say!

Text: 为何不进去看看那些孩子们还好不好…
OriginalText: Whyn’cha get in there and see if the lads and lass are their right selves...
...or if they’re all waterlogged and jelly-fied limy skeletons?
Hoo boy, I hope they’re fine!

Text: 要不然就怪你不早点把我叫醒！
OriginalText: It'll be your fault for not wakin' me up sooner!
Want me to raise the Metal Fish?
Let me know when you’re ready!
The <1>METAL FISH</1> is ready to board!
You've got some explaining to do!

Text: 我会回答你一个问题。只有一个问题！
OriginalText: I'll answer one question, and one question only!

Text: 你来到这岛屿真正的原因是什么？
OriginalText: What are you really doing on this island?

Text: 你真的只是来找那<1>宝藏</1>吗？
OriginalText: Did you just come here to find that <1>TREASURE</1>?

Text: 那好像算是两个问题呢。
OriginalText: That sounded like two questions to me.

Text: 那些女孩在你出现时消失……
OriginalText: Those girls vanishing at the same time you show up...

Text: 就像我之前说的，我来是为了<1>宝藏</1>！
OriginalText: Like I told you before, I'm here for the <1>TREASURE</1>!

Text: 你怎么能够偷走一整个城市呢？
OriginalText: How can you steal an entire city?
I believe that's enough questions for now.
What is that supposed to mean?
I’ll get you out of there!

Text: 嗯。又是一个奇怪的笼子！
OriginalText: Hmm. It's another of these bizarre cages!

Text: 我们需要一个逃生计划。
它能让你<1>瞬间变形</1>成新形态！
OriginalText: It will allow you to <1>TRANSFORM INSTANTLY</1> into a new form!

Text: 这枚上有<1>棒克乌龟</1>的符号！
OriginalText: This one bears the mark of a <1>BONKER TORTOISE</1>!

Text: 棒克乌龟是岛上的稀有生物。
OriginalText: Bonker Tortoises are rare creatures that inhabit this island.

Text: 它们不能游泳，但可以<1>打破石头</1>，以及用顶部的尖刺<1>旋转</1>！
OriginalText: They can’t swim, but they can <1>SMASH STONE</1> and even <1>SPIN</1> on their top spike!

Text: 也许你能使用它的能力去找出这地方的<1>邪恶之源</1>！
OriginalText: Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Stomp/>来从上空<1>踩</1>下来！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Stomp/> in air to <1>STOMP</1> from above!

Text: 也可以蓄力后释放<IB action=Attack/>来使用破坏性的<1>旋转快冲</1>！试试看吧！
OriginalText: You can also charge up and release <IB action=Attack/> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中时下滑屏幕来从上空<1>踩</1>下来！
OriginalText: Swipe down on the screen in air to <1>STOMP</1> from above.

Text: 也可以蓄力后释放<1>(!) button</1>来使用破坏性的<1>旋转快冲</1>！试试看吧！
OriginalText: You can also charge up and release the <1>(!) button</1> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Stomp/>来<1>踩</1>，或蓄力后释放<IB action=Attack/>来<1>旋转快冲</1>！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Stomp/> in air to <1>STOMP</1>, or charge up and release <IB action=Attack/> to <1>SPIN DASH</1>!

Text: 在半空中时下滑屏幕来<1>踩</1>，或者蓄力后释放来<1>旋转快冲</1>！
OriginalText: Swipe down in air to <1>STOMP</1>, or charge up and release to to <1>SPIN DASH</1>

Text: 我们已经回到水面了吗？
OriginalText: Did we return to the surface already?

Text: 还是我的深度计坏了呢？
OriginalText: Or is my depth gauge busted?

Text: 小心。那怪物也许还在外面！
OriginalText: Careful. That thing might still be out there!

Text: 我从地下收到了一些很有趣的读数。
OriginalText: I am getting some interesting readings from down below.

Text: 一个奇怪的光点！附近可能有某种海底能源吗？
OriginalText: An odd blip! Could an undersea power source exist nearby?

Text: 没有什么能比得上铁鱼的安全！
OriginalText: There's nothing like the safety of the <1>METAL FISH</1>!

Text: 这些好心的朋友是我的科学家同伴！
OriginalText: These nice folks are my fellow scientists!
So glad you could join us.

Text: 我们正要把<1>铁鱼</1>潜到更深的地方！
OriginalText: We were just about to take the <1>METAL FISH</1> even deeper!

Text: 我不再对美人鱼有兴趣了。
OriginalText: I have lost my interest in mermaids.

Text: 海牛才是最新的热门话题。
我在<1>潜艇码头</1>的<1>西边</1>看见一个<1>故障的风扇</1>。
OriginalText: I saw a <1>BROKEN FAN</1> to the <1>WEST</1> of the <1>SUBMARINE DOCK</1>.

Text: 真可惜，没有<1>螺母和螺钉</1>它就会一直故障下去。
OriginalText: Sadly, without <1>NUTS AND BOLTS</1> it will stay broken!

Text: 救命！我们的同伴<1>科学头脑</1><1>迷路了</1>！
传感器指出他在科学实验室<1>东</1>边<1>被淹的走廊</1>里！
OriginalText: Sensors say he's somewhere in the <1>FLOODED HALLS</1> of the Science Laboratory, on the <1>EAST</1> side!

Text: 我会在你的<1>地图</1>上标出位置!
OriginalText: I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!

Text: 我们的任务是研究所有关于沉没城市的事！
OriginalText: Our mission is to learn everything we can about the Sunken City!
That the lower levels are cursed...

Text: 但我们对世俗之见说<1>不</1>!
OriginalText: But we say <1>NO</1> to conventional wisdom!

Text: 让我们下潜到世俗毫无意义的地方！
OriginalText: Let us descend to a place where wisdom is without meaning!
To the very <1>BOTTOM</1> of the food chain!
Want to see what's down there?
Ready to take a ride in the <1>METAL FISH</1>?
Let us know when you’re ready!
Take a deep breath! Metal Fish, going down!

Text: 我们到了！欢迎来到沉没城市！
OriginalText: This is it! Welcome to the Sunken City!
Want to return to the surface?
Let us know when you’re ready!

Text: 抓紧哦！很快就能看到蓝天和太阳了！
OriginalText: Hang on tight! You’ll soon see blue skies and sunlight!
Are you guys sure this thing is safe?
Of course! There's nothing to worry about!

Text: 如果有任何危险，迫近警报就会响起！
OriginalText: If we were in any danger at all, the proximity alarm would tell us!
Water is the sailor's best friend!
Stopping by to say hello, that's all!

Text: 不过是一种自然生物而已，大海的馈赠！
OriginalText: Merely one of nature's creatures, the bounty of the sea!

Text: 这是有史以来最糟糕的度假！！
OriginalText: THIS IS THE WORST VACATION EVER!

Text: 我们也许能通电到外船体！
OriginalText: We could electrify the outer hull!
Maybe that will scare the beastie off!

Text: 那不是也会把我们电了吗？
只有一个方法才能知道！
我就知道这方法一定行的！
OriginalText: I had a feeling that might do the trick!

Text: 我已经找到两个消失的女孩了！
OriginalText: I found two of the missing girls already!
Time for me to turn over.

Text: 找完剩下的再来跟我说。
OriginalText: Let me know when you find the others.

Text: 我现在得找出消失的女孩！
OriginalText: I need to find the missing girls, NOW!
Yeah, I am moving out of your way!

Text: 不过首先，我得向你展示我的想法!
OriginalText: But first, I need to show you my idea!

Text: 你扮演勇敢的鱿鱼男爵！
OriginalText: You play as the bold and daring Squid Baron!

Text: 你的任务是要找出被隐藏的<1>三颗聋珠</1>。
OriginalText: Your quest is to find <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1> that are hidden about.

Text: 可是找完之后，你就得离开！
按照预言，你是唯一能使用聋珠的人。
OriginalText: According to the prophecy, you're the only one who can wield the Dagron Balls.

Text: 因为你的左手上有勇者的标记。
OriginalText: And that's because you bear the mark of the champ on your left hand.
Which hand is my left hand?

Text: 我在雕像里放了<1>三颗聋珠</1>。
OriginalText: You'll find the <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1> trapped inside the statues that I put them in.

Text: 使用你的能力把雕塑叫醒。
OriginalText: Use your powers to wake up the statues.

Text: 找到<1>三颗聋珠</1>后再回来这里！
OriginalText: Come back here when you have found all  <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1>!

Text: 哦，你带了要找的东西吗？

OriginalText: Will you deliver the <1>DAGRON BALLS</1> unto me?

Text: 现在我通常会给你个奖品之类的，而你就会变得更强。
OriginalText: Now I'd give you a treat or whatever, and you'd get more powerful.

Text: 可以让我回到我的救援任务了吗？
OriginalText: Can I please get back to my rescue mission now?
I'm off to check on my investments.

Text: 等等～你没有找到所有聋珠！
OriginalText: Wait - you didn't get all of the items!

Text: 唉！我以为他永远不会离开了呢！
OriginalText: Whew! I thought he'd never leave!
And no worse for the wear!

Text: 你想回到水面的话，我们一直在这。
OriginalText: Any time you'd like to return to the surface, we'll be here.

Text: 麻烦帮个忙来检查船体有没有受到损害，好吗？
OriginalText: Be a dear and check the hull for damage, would you?

Text: 我还以为你听不到我敲门呢。
OriginalText: For a minute there I thought you couldn't hear me knocking.
That was you banging on the sub?!

Text: 你让我们大家都处于危险中！
OriginalText: You put us all in danger!!

Text: 这非常重要，所以我得跟你讨论。
OriginalText: This is important which is why I needed to talk to you.
Is this about the missing girls?

Text: 我有个关于电子游戏的主意。
OriginalText: I have an  idea for a video game.
Hear me out, this is awesome.
I will be the star, and…

Text: 我们在这里面对着极端的危险！
OriginalText: We are in EXTREME danger down here!

Text: 这里住许多邪恶的怪兽，会吞噬你的灵魂！
OriginalText: This place is home to foul creatures that will feast on your very SOUL!

Text: 我还是直接给你看更好。
鱿鱼男爵也在这岛屿上？
OriginalText: The Squid Baron is on this island, too?
As if I didn't have enough to deal with!

Text: 请去外面检查一下船体是否受到损伤。
OriginalText: Please go outside and check the hull for damage.

Text: 哇，那<1>乌龟</1>魔法帮大忙了！
OriginalText: Boy, that <1>TORTOISE</1> magic sure came in handy!

Text: 我从来没想过我能这样变形！
OriginalText: I never knew I could transform like that!
You're creeping me out a bit.

Text: 你到底是怎么逃出你的笼子的？
OriginalText: How did you get out of your cage, anyway?

Text: 我根本没有被关在笼子里。
OriginalText: I was never in a cage.

Text: 我在表演中没有被抓走。
OriginalText: I wasn't captured during the performance.
You're the ONLY one that wasn't captured?
Huh... Now that you mention it...

Text: 我救出了普林可和薇拉……
所以我想布织稻和哈莫尼还被关在底下某处。
OriginalText: So I'm guessing Fillin and Harmony are still trapped down here somewhere.

Text: 这情况感觉有点不对劲。
OriginalText: Something about this doesn't feel right.

Text: 我要去跟普林可和薇拉商量一下。
OriginalText: I'm going to have a word with Plink and Vera.

Text: 你该不会是认为我跟这些事情有什么关系吧？
OriginalText: You don't think I had anything to do with these goings on?

Text: 你准备好时，在<1>护甲镇</1>跟我碰面。
OriginalText: When you’re ready, meet me in <1>ARMOR TOWN</1>.
It's at the <1>FAR EAST SIDE</1> of the island.
I'll be waiting for you there.

Text: 普林可和薇拉两位都跟你分享了她们的能力。
OriginalText: Both Plink and Vera shared their abilities with you.

Text: 我就是因为有了她们的能力才有办法救出你的！
OriginalText: It's because of their powers that I was able to find you!

Text: 她们大概觉得欠了你，才给你能力。
OriginalText: They probably felt obligated to give you their power.

Text: 但我没有感觉欠你什么。
但我愿意信任薇拉和普林可。
OriginalText: But I'm willing to trust Vera and Plink.

Text: 带给我一块<1>融合石</1>，我就也跟你分享我的魔法。
OriginalText: Bring me a <1>FUSION STONE</1> and I'll share my magic with you, too.

Text: 然后我会亲眼见证你的英勇之举。
OriginalText: Then I'll see these heroics for myself.

Text: 带给我一块<1>融合石</1>，我就跟你分享我的魔法。
OriginalText: Bring me a <1>FUSION STONE</1> and I'll share my magic with you.

Text: 你果然和她们说的一样能干。
OriginalText: You're as resourceful as they say.
I guess I gave my word.

Text: 准备好<1>结合我们的魔法</1>了吗？

OriginalText: Prove that you're worthy of my trust!

Text: <1>火花舞</1>可以启动机械，或电击金属！
OriginalText: The <1>SPARK DANCE</1> can activate machinery, or shock metal!

Text: （在跳舞时，按<IB action=Right/>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (While DANCING, press <IB action=Right/> to activate the magic!)

Text: （在跳舞时，点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> 来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (While dancing, touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: 何不在这房间里试试看<1>火花舞</1>呢？
OriginalText: Why not test the <1>SPARK DANCE</1> in this room?

Text: <1>火花舞</1>可以启动机械，或电击金属！
OriginalText: The <1>SPARK DANCE</1> can activate machinery, or shock metal!
(While DANCING, press <IB action=Right/> to activate the magic!)

Text: （跳舞时，点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43>启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (While dancing, touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: 你不会跟弹药男爵有亲属关系吧？
OriginalText: You’re not by any chance related to the Ammo Baron back home, are you?
So you finally got off your rump.

Text: 你之前说了没有任何事能使你离开游泳池。
OriginalText: You said nothing could make you leave the pool.

Text: 他说你掉进城市里了，也提到了海妖和靴子险险……
OriginalText: He said you fell into the city, and something about Sirens and Risky Boots...

Text: 你怎么不早点告诉我这一切呢？
OriginalText: Why didn't you tell me all this before?

Text: 如果早知道，我一定会抛开一切冲过来帮你！
OriginalText: If I'd known, I would have dropped everything and rushed to your aid!

Text: 我两章之前就能够遇到这帅男神！
OriginalText: I could have met this rugged stallion two chapters ago!

Text: 他真的是弹药男爵的兄弟吗？
OriginalText: Is he really Ammo Baron's brother?

Text: 他一定遗传到了他家的好模样，对吧？
OriginalText: He must've got the good looks in the family, eh?
Now I really don't trust him.

Text: 没什么好担心的，我向你们保证。
OriginalText: There is no need for concern, I assure you.

Text: 我不像我亲爱的弟弟一样好斗吵闹。
OriginalText: I am not the belligerent, bellowing, buffoon that my dear sweet brother is.

Text: 虽然我爱他不得了，但他的行为实在让我糟心。
OriginalText: Love him though I may, his actions weigh heavily on my heart.
You mean you're a good guy?

Text: 但拜托，请别因为一个名字相关的人就臆断我。
OriginalText: But please, withhold the harsh judgement my namesake has surely earned.

Text: 给我个表达我真诚心意的机会。
OriginalText: Give me a chance to demonstrate my pure intentions.
It is the <1>MATURE</1> thing to do.

Text: 它会是我们镇有史以来打造过的！
OriginalText: It will be the greatest armor my town has ever forged!
And forging of armor we have done!

Text: ……和坚实的护甲一直都是护甲镇所有人民共有的目标！
OriginalText: ...and sturdy body armor has been the shared goal in the life of every citizen of Armor Town!

Text: 我们被打造于人生的熔炉。
OriginalText: We are forged in the forge of life.

Text: 而我们也将<1>打造更好的明天</1>！
OriginalText: And so we <1>FORGE FORWARD</1> each and every day!
That is a lot of forging.

Text: 但我们无法自己完成这项任务……
OriginalText: But we can not accomplish this task on our own..

Text: 要打造极致的半精灵护甲……
OriginalText: To forge the ultimate, xtreme, Half-Genie Armor...

Text: 这些矿石是在岛上白沙丘那持续的热度中形成的。
OriginalText: These chunks are formed by the relentless heat of the <1>WHITE SAND DUNES</1> found on this island.

Text: ……而我就会为你打造最顶级、最极致、最强力的<1>半精灵护甲</1>！
OriginalText: ...and I will forge you the ultimate, xtreme, powers unleashed <1>HALF-GENIE ARMOR</1>!
Consider it a gesture of good will.

Text: 为我亲爱、误入歧途的弟弟道歉的方式。
OriginalText: My way of apologizing on behalf of my dear, misguided brother.
A gift for the Mayor of Arena Town.

Text: 我相信里面写了许多沉没城市的防御安全码。
OriginalText: I believe it contains <1>SECURITY CODES</1> to the Sunken City's defenses.

Text: 加上一点运气，他就能永远地封住那些海妖！
OriginalText: With luck, he'll be able to seal those nasty Sirens away for good!

Text: 如果你不介意带给他的话。
OriginalText: If you don't mind delivering them, that is.

Text: 你可以在<1>场馆镇</1>找到市长。
OriginalText: You can find the mayor back in <1>ARENA TOWN</1>.

Text: 也别忘了那<1>三块矿石</1>哦！
OriginalText: And don't forget about those <1>THREE ORE CHUNKS</1>!

Text: 带给我<1>三块矿石</1>，我就会为你打造最极致的<1>半精灵护甲</1>！
OriginalText: Bring me <1>THREE ORE CHUNKS</1> and I will forge you the ultimate <1>HALF-GENIE ARMOR</1>!

Text: 但首先，记得把<1>编码簿</1>带回<1>场馆镇</1>给市长。
OriginalText: But first, be sure to take that <1>CODE BOOK</1> to the mayor back in <1>ARENA TOWN</1>.
You don't have to hold my hand!

Text: 我从场馆镇来的路上看到一些白沙丘。何不在那里找找矿石块呢？
OriginalText: I saw some <1>WHITE SAND DUNES</1> on my way here from Arena Town. Why not try looking for your <1>ORE CHUNKS</1> there?

Text: 快去把它给<1>护甲男爵</1>，好让你能获得那超酷的护甲！
OriginalText: Go on and give them to the <1>ARMOR BARON</1> so you can get that sweet body armor!

Text: 你完成了吗？这些<1>矿石</1>是给我的吗？
OriginalText: You've done it? Are these <1>ORE CHUNKS</1> for me?

Text: 你还得多找一些！总共需要<1>三</1>块。
OriginalText: You'll need to find more of them! <1>THREE</1> to be exact.
<1>THREE ORE CHUNKS</1>, just as I asked!
There's enough here to make <1>TWO</1> sets of armor!
I will craft armor for you...

Text: ……也会为天天造一套顶级、极致、强力、未经授权的<1>战鸟训练师护甲</1>！
OriginalText: ...and also ultimate, xtreme, powers unleashed, unauthorized <1>WAR BIRD TRAINER ARMOR</1> for Sky as well!

Text: 它能轻到能让我骑着鸟背在天空飞吗？
OriginalText: Will it be light enough for me to fly on birdback?

Text: 别再犹豫了，小姐，就让我的<1>时尚前卫锻造师</1>们来接手吧！
OriginalText: Then step right up, ladies, and let my <1>FASHION FORGEWARD FORGERS</1> take over!

Text: 哇～！顶级、极致、强力、未经授权的护甲！
OriginalText: Whhhooooaaaahhh! Ultimate, xtreme, powers unleashed, unauthorized body armor!
Yeah but <1>NOT VERY MUCH OF IT</1>!

Text: 我亲自保证这护甲会让你们永远保持<1>崭新状态</1>。
OriginalText: You have my personal guarantee that this armor will keep you in <1>MINT CONDITION</1>.
Hey! I can’t even move in this stuff!

Text: 这护甲被<1>熔成坚硬的一块</1>了！
OriginalText: This armor is <1>FUSED INTO ONE SOLID PIECE</1>!

Text: 你最好别再闹了，护甲男爵！
OriginalText: You’d better stop messing around, <1>ARMOR BARON</1>!

Text: 真抱歉，小姐们，但有一位顶级收藏家已经在路上……
OriginalText: I’m sorry ladies, but I have a <1>TOP TIER</1> collector on the way...

Text: ……而他只对<1>崭新状态</1>的收藏品有兴趣！
OriginalText: ...and he’s only interested in collectables that are <1>MINT CONDITION</1>!

Text: 你们二位将会留在卡片上…
OriginalText: You ladies will need to remain on the card...

Text: 这家伙跟他弟弟一摸一样！
OriginalText: This jerk is just like his brother!
See you in the collector’s catalog!

Text: 我真不敢相信你会想把活人当成儿童玩具卖掉！
OriginalText: I can't believe you'd try to pass off real people as kids toys!
Especially ones that look like this!
I'm gonna report you to the authorities!

Text: 那我就要你赔偿我们的损失！
OriginalText: Then I'll make you pay for damages!

Text: 你做坏事赚到的钱全都交给我！
OriginalText: Hand over everything you made by being a horrible person!

Text: 我是个凄惨、可悲的巨婴!（抽泣）
OriginalText: I'm just a sad, pathetic man-baby! Sniff!

Text: 跟你朋友，天天，说我已经认错了！
OriginalText: Tell your friend, Sky, that I have seen the error of my ways!

Text: 而我很对不起改变了她的外貌……
OriginalText: And that I'm sorry for changing her appearance...

Text: 我再也不会这么做了！(抽泣)
OriginalText: I will never do it again! Sniff!
Oh, hey. How's the rescue going?

Text: 你应该看看我房间里能选的点心。
OriginalText: You should see the snack options in my guest room.

Text: 这些螺蛳吃起来就像你叔叔挖起来的东西。
OriginalText: This bag of corncob nut snacks tastes like something your uncle dug up.
I came here to find a seaside vending beast.

Text: 但目前为止，什么都没有。
我真的为了一片<1>脆烤面包</1>什么都愿意做。
OriginalText: I'd do anything for a slice of <1>MELBA TOAST</1>.

Text: 我真的为了一片<1>脆烤面包</1>什么都愿意做。
OriginalText: I'd do anything for a slice of <1>MELBA TOAST</1>.

Text: 你道具里那个是<1>脆烤面包</1>吗？
OriginalText: Is that <1>MELBA TOAST</1> in your inventory?

Text: 我是认真的，你应该把烤面包给我。
OriginalText: Seriously, you should give that toast to me.

Text: 我从这些人这里根本要不到任何食物。
OriginalText: I can't even get food from these nice folks.

Text: 每一次我要一些椰子，他们就打我耳光。
OriginalText: Each time I request some coconuts, they slap my face.

Text: 我真的为了一片<1>脆烤面包</1>什么都愿意做。
OriginalText: I'd do anything for a slice of <1>MELBA TOAST</1>.
Salty toast with a mighty crunch!

Text: 感觉我的嘴好好地度了个假。
OriginalText: That was like a vacation for my mouth.

Text: 说真的，我现在可以回家了。
OriginalText: Seriously, I could go home now.

Text: 你可以把这些恶心的螺蛳拿去。
OriginalText: You can have these disgusting corncob nut snacks.
It's a bag of actual nuts!

Text: 我还是觉得它们有河里的味道。
OriginalText: I still say they taste like ranch.

Text: 你可以留着那些<1>螺母和螺钉</1>！
OriginalText: You can keep those <1>NUTS AND BOLTS</1>!

Text: 我们被移走了！我们在哪儿？
OriginalText: We’ve been moved! Where are we?
I sure scored big this time!

Text: 这些手办根本没上过支架！
OriginalText: These figs have never even been on the peg!
No yellowing on the blister pack!

Text: 这金头发的脸真扭曲，像是个制造瑕疵！
OriginalText: The blonde one’s face looks screwy, like a factory defect!

Text: 在收藏家市场上一定值好几百万！
OriginalText: It’s gotta be worth <1>MILLIONS</1> on the collector’s market!

Text: 不过我得想别的办法来给我的电子游戏筹钱了！
OriginalText: Then again, I need to fund my video game somehow!

Text: 这些娃娃是电池供电的。
我得打开包装，确认一下。
OriginalText: I must open the packaging, just to make sure.
The jig is up, Squid Baron.
Yeah, just let us out of here.
We'll just make it their problem.

Text: 屁股上通常应该有个厂商的标记。
OriginalText: There should be a manufacturer's stamp right on the ol' bottom.

Text: 对啊！我们才不要当你的娃娃收藏品呢！
OriginalText: Yeah! We’re not gonna be part of your man-doll collection!

Text: 这些才不是娃娃，是可动手办！
OriginalText: THESE ARE NOT DOLLS, THEY ARE ACTION FIGURES!
ARTICULATED WORKS OF ART SUITABLE FOR DISPLAY!
You can call them whatever you want!

Text: 你们显然是山寨货，因此是次等品。
OriginalText: You’re obviously bootlegs, and therefore inferior models.

Text: 到时候我把这收藏卖个大价钱你就会后悔了！
OriginalText: You'll be sorry when I flip this collection for <1>BIG BUCKS</1>!

Text: 拜托，你才不会卖掉这些东西呢。
OriginalText: Oh please. You won't sell this stuff.

Text: 我只是为我自己的游戏筹钱！
OriginalText: I'm only doing this to <1>FUND MY OWN GAME</1>!

Text: 它会是场史诗级冒险，主角是我！
OriginalText: It will be an <1>EPIC ADVENTURE</1> starring <1>ME</1>!

Text: 很像你的冒险，但会更好！
OriginalText: It will be a lot like <1>YOUR</1> adventures, only better!

Text: 全部都会是水系主题的！
还会有个大美女在他的液体脑袋里舒展着，说，"嘿宝贝"！
OriginalText: There'll also be a radical hot babe, just <1>CHILLIN’ OUT</1> in his liquid brain like <1>HEY BABY</1>!

Text: 玩家会分心到忘了怎么战斗！
OriginalText: Players'll be so distracted they'll forget how to fight!

Text: 没有人会在意主角，因为Boss是如此的……
OriginalText: No one cares about the <1>HERO</1> because the <1>BOSS</1> is so…

Text: 但这不是我第一次见到她！
OriginalText: But this isn't the first time I've seen her!

Text: 无论是谁，她好像是想帮我们的。
OriginalText: Whoever she is, she seems to be on our side.

Text: 你去找出那些消失的女孩。
我要用护甲男爵自己的护甲打他一顿。
OriginalText: I'm going to beat Armor Baron with his own armor.

Text: 我已经没有生命能被剥夺了！
OriginalText: I have no life left to take!
Half-Genies are daughters of the Genies.
I came here looking for my friends!

Text: 她们被海妖抓走了，而现在我得把她们找出来！
OriginalText: They were captured by Sirens, and now I've got to find them!
One way to know for certain!

Text: 做件善事，只有精灵能做得出的！
OriginalText: Do a good deed, as only a Genie would!

Text: 这样我才知道你是可信的。
OriginalText: Then I'll know you are worthy of trust!

Text: 把我的<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来给我！
宝贵的礼物，是我的传家宝！
OriginalText: A precious gift, a family keepsake it was!

Text: 很久以前，当我撞上这诅咒的岛屿时丢的！
OriginalText: Lost when I crashed on this accursed island long ago!
A Guardian Genie is always on duty!

Text: 我会把你娃娃带回来给你的。
OriginalText: I'll return your doll to you.
You certainly SEEM like an honest one.

Text: 这是我唯一值钱的东西。
OriginalText: It is the only thing of value I've managed to hold onto.

Text: 把我的<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来，而我就会帮你找你的朋友！
OriginalText: Return my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>, and I will help you find your friends!

Text: 我已经没有生命能被剥夺了！
OriginalText: I have no life left to take!
Half-Genies are daughters of the Genies.
I came here looking for my friends!

Text: 她们被海妖抓走了，而现在我得把她们找出来！
OriginalText: They were captured by Sirens, and now I've got to find them!
One way to know for certain!

Text: 做件善事，只有精灵能做得出的！
OriginalText: Do a good deed, as only a Genie would!

Text: 这样我才知道你是可信的。
OriginalText: Then I'll know you are worthy of trust!

Text: 把我的<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来给我！
宝贵的礼物，是我的传家宝！
OriginalText: A precious gift, a family keepsake it was!

Text: 很久以前，当我撞上这诅咒的岛屿时丢的！
OriginalText: Lost when I crashed on this accursed island long ago!
A Guardian Genie is always on duty!

Text: 我会把你娃娃带回来给你的。
OriginalText: I'll return your doll to you.
You certainly SEEM like an honest one.

Text: 这是我唯一值钱的东西。
OriginalText: It is the only thing of value I've managed to hold onto.

Text: 把我的<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来，而我就会帮你找你的朋友！
OriginalText: Return my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>, and I will help you find your friends!

Text: 这是我唯一值钱的东西。
OriginalText: It is the only thing of value I've managed to hold onto.

Text: 把我的<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来，而我就会帮你找你的朋友！
OriginalText: Return my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>, and I will help you find your friends!

Text: 把我的<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来，而我就会帮你找你的朋友！
OriginalText: Return my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>, and I will help you find your friends!

Text: 也许<1>地面上的孩子</1>把它拿去了！
OriginalText: Perhaps a <1>CHILD FROM THE SURFACE</1> has claimed it!

Text: 这是什么？你找出我的 <1>恐怖娃娃</1>了？
OriginalText: Oh, what's this? You have found my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>?

Text: 在你把它交给我之前，你还不值得我信任！
OriginalText: Until you hand it over, your trust is not earned!

Text: 我能看得出半精灵女儿在追随她妈妈的脚步。
OriginalText: I see that the Half-Genie daughter follows in the footsteps of her Genie mother.

Text: 当精灵们离开时，我为这世界感到担忧。
OriginalText: When the Genies went away, I feared for this world.

Text: 但也许半精灵能逆转邪恶的潮流。
OriginalText: But perhaps the Half-Genies can turn the tides of evil.

Text: 这扇门另一边就是把我困在这儿的海妖的巢穴。
OriginalText: Beyond this door you'll find the lair of the Siren who trapped me here.

Text: 而我只能眼睁睁地看着。无形无体而无奈。
OriginalText: All I could do was watch. Helpless and without form.
The path before you is haunted!

Text: 我得想办法联络上大陆……
OriginalText: Got to contact the mainland somehow...
Oh? You have something for me?

Text: 如果需要我，我就在这儿。
OriginalText: I'll be here if you need me.

Text: 我们护甲镇的邻居有提过这件事！
OriginalText: Our neighbors in Armor Town spoke of this!

Text: 沉没城市是个非常复杂的建筑物，而许多部分都被封住了。
OriginalText: The Sunken City is a complex structure, and much of it is sealed off.

Text: 我的希望是，如果能更了解城市的建设方式……
OriginalText: My hope is that with a better understanding of how the city was built...
...I can block the advance of those creatures.

Text: 你知道岛屿底下有怪兽？
OriginalText: You knew there were creatures lurking beneath this island?

Text: 而你还是在这儿建设场馆镇？
OriginalText: And you still built Arena Town here?

Text: 这小镇本来已经在这儿了。
OriginalText: You see... The town was already here.

Text: 我把它买下来，是为了想创造最顶级的度假圣地。
OriginalText: I purchased it in hopes of creating the ultimate vacation destination.

Text: 价格很低，而他们也真的急着想卖掉。
OriginalText: The cost was low, and they were so eager to sell.

Text: 我甚至把岛屿的名字都改了。
OriginalText: I even had the island renamed.

Text: 没人会想来海妖岛度假！
OriginalText: No one would want to spend their vacation on Siren Island!

Text: 我知道你不想让我去乱找麻烦……
OriginalText: I know you wanted me to stay out of trouble...
...Into the Sunken City beneath the island.

Text: 是我释放了普林可和薇拉。还有匝魄！
OriginalText: I was the one who freed Plink and Vera. And Zapple, too!
But... How could you accomplish this?

Text: 其他半精灵使用融合石跟我分享了她们的魔法！
OriginalText: The other Half-Genies used Fusion Stones to share their magic with me!

Text: 而其他两位魔法女孩……她们还在下面吗？
OriginalText: And the other two magical girls... they're still down there?
Young lady, I owe you an apology.

Text: 我小看了你的能力，因为你是最小的。
OriginalText: I underestimated your abilities just because you were the youngest.

Text: 不管使用什么手段，把那些女孩找出来，并阻止那些海妖！
OriginalText: Do whatever it takes to find those girls and <1>STOP</1> those Sirens!

Text: 而我会做我早就该做的事……
OriginalText: I will do what I should have done long ago...
Oh? What's this on the ground?
Whoever dropped this must be awfully hungry!

Text: 你说你是来偷走城市的!
OriginalText: You said you came here to steal the city!

Text: 那我就没有别的选择了！
OriginalText: Then you leave me little choice!
I'll get you out of there.

Text: 普林可、薇拉和匝魄安全回到家了。
OriginalText: Plink, Vera, and Zapple are home safe.
I still need to find Fillin.
She told me her name was Ima.

Text: 我一见她就知道了，但她感觉好像需要朋友。
OriginalText: I knew right away, but she seemed to need a friend.

Text: 现在因为我，她也被卷进这团乱麻。
OriginalText: Now because of me she's mixed up in this madness.
I have to get her back!
It bears the marking of a <1>SEA FROG</1>!

Text: 海蛙是岛上的稀有生物。
OriginalText: Sea Frogs are rare creatures that inhabit this island.

Text: 它们能在海中高速游泳！
OriginalText: They can swim through salt water at super high speeds!

Text: 也许你能使用它的能力去找出这地方的<1>邪恶之源</1>！
OriginalText: By using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!

Text:
在深水中，按<IB action=Down/>来游泳！
若想减速，按住<IB action=Attack/>！
OriginalText:
When in deep water, simply press <IB action=Down/> to swim!
If you need to slow down, hold <IB action=Attack/>!

Text: 在深水中，按下按钮来游泳！若想减速，按住(!)按钮！
OriginalText: When in deep water, simply press down to swim! If you need to slow down, hold the (!) button.

Text:
在深水中，按<IB action=Down/>来游泳！
若想减速，按住<IB action=Attack/>！
OriginalText:
When in deep water, simply press <IB action=Down/> to swim!
If you need to slow down, hold <IB action=Attack/>!

Text: 在深水中，按下按钮来游泳！若想减速，按住(!)按钮！
OriginalText: When in deep water, simply press down to swim! If you need to slow down, hold the (!) button.

Text: 阻止她们，免得她们把我东西弄坏！
OriginalText: Stop them before they break my stuff!

Text: 哇，那<1>海蛙</1>魔法真有用呢！
OriginalText: Boy, that <1>SEA FROG</1> Magic sure came in handy!

Text: 我从来没想到我能这样变形！
OriginalText: I never knew I could transform like that!

Text: 你能做的比你想象的多！
OriginalText: You're capable of much more than you know!
It was a gift from my mother.

Text: 其实是我们所有的妈妈一起送的。
OriginalText: From ALL of our mothers, really.

Text: 在动身回到她们的世界之前，每位精灵都留下了一些话。
OriginalText: Before they left for their own realm, each Genie wrote something down.
It's full of memories, bits of advice...

Text: 所有她们想跟我们分享的东西。
OriginalText: All of the things they wanted to share with us.

Text: 因为我是最大的，她们就把书交给了我。
OriginalText: Since I was the oldest, they left the book in my care.

Text: 我希望通过来到这个岛……
OriginalText: I'd hoped that by visiting this island...

Text: ……我就终于能跟你们其他半精灵一起分享它！
OriginalText: ...I'd finally be able to share it with other Half-Genies like you!
There's a message for ME in there?
Then count on me to help!

Text: 如果有我能帮上忙的事，尽管问！
OriginalText: If there's anything I can do, just ask!

Text: 请别人帮忙实在不简单……
OriginalText: Asking for help is kinda hard...

Text: 普林可、薇拉和匝魄都用了融合石跟我融合能力。
OriginalText: Plink, Vera, and Zapple used Fusion Stones to merge their powers with me.

Text: 她们的魔法帮我救出了你。
OriginalText: Their magic helped me rescue you.
Would you share your magic with me, too?

Text: 请别人帮忙一定才是最难的挑战。
OriginalText: Asking for help must be the toughest challenge of all!

Text: 好啊， 我很开心跟你分享我的能力。
OriginalText: Sure, I'd be happy to share my abilities with you.

Text: 可是，我们需要一块<1>融合石</1>！
OriginalText: But for that, we'll need a <1>FUSION STONE</1>!
We'd better start searching for one!

Text: 你的朋友很有趣呢。她说你的任务需要精灵魔法。
OriginalText: Your friend here is very interesting. She says you need <1>GENIE MAGIC</1> for your quest.

Text: 我个人是没有魔法，但在更深处的海底有一位。
OriginalText: I do not have any of my own, but there is someone deeper down, at the bottom of the sea.

Text: 这<1>邋遢的老鬼</1>也许能帮助你。
OriginalText: This <1>MANGY OLD GHOST</1> might be able to help you.

Text: 前往<1>海底</1>，你很快就会找到你所寻找的。
OriginalText: Travel to the <1>OCEAN FLOOR</1>, and you will soon find that which you seek!
A <1>DOG COLLAR</1>? May I see it?
The stone pendant is a <1>FUSION STONE</1>!

Text: 最好把它给你红头发的朋友！
OriginalText: Best to give that to your red-haired friend!

Text: 我叫她不要循着声音走！
OriginalText: I told her not to follow voices.

Text: 还在海底，但没有我们这么深！
OriginalText: Still undersea, but not so deep as we are now!

Text: 去吧！去上面的矿山找你朋友……
OriginalText: Go! Find your friend in the <1>MINES ABOVE</1>...
...and give her the <1>FUSION STONE</1> that you hold!

Text: 去吧！去上面的矿山找你朋友……
OriginalText: Go! Find your friend in the <1>MINES ABOVE</1>...
...and give her the <1>FUSION STONE</1> that you hold!
The other still hides in the mines!
Back to the <1>GHOST DOG</1> with you!

Text: 可是你不知道要带去哪儿，是吗？
OriginalText: But you don't know where to take it, do you?

Text: 岛上哪个地方我没有去过？
<1>深海</1>里的<1>控制室</1>就是你的目标！
OriginalText: The <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> in <1>DEEP SEA</1> is your goal!

Text: 试试看鬼狗<1>上面三层</1>的地方！
OriginalText: Try <1>THREE FLOORS UP</1> from the Ghost Dog!

Text: 也许你该去<1>东边的实验室</1>！
OriginalText: Perhaps the <1>SCIENCE LAB</1> to the <1>EAST</1> will serve you best!

Text: 在上面的矿山使用你的震撼舞！
OriginalText: Use your <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> in the <1>MINES</1> above!
Welcome to the very <1>BOTTOM OF THE SEA</1>.
I am a lowly ghost dog.

Text: 我正在拯救我朋友的途中。
OriginalText: I'm on a quest to rescue my friend.

Text: 你的朋友一定在这封闭的门的另一边。
OriginalText: Your friend must be trapped beyond this seal.
In order to open the hatch...

Text: 就得恢复整个城市的电力！
OriginalText: You would need to <1>RESTORE POWER</1> to the city!
I'm not afraid of the Seven Sirens!

Text: 我已经面对了四个～而且都赢了！
OriginalText: I've already faced four of them - and won!
The Sirens below are <1>ENDLESS IN NUMBER</1>!

Text: 我不管有七个海妖，还是七百个！
OriginalText: Well, I don't care if there are seven Sirens, or seven hundred!

Text: 你愿意<1>冒一切风险</1>，救出你的朋友？
OriginalText: Would you risk <1>EVERYTHING</1> to save your friend?
Good. It must never be opened!

Text: 很久以前，这岛屿的守护者在上面的<1>矿山</1>里藏了<1>两个手镯</1>。
OriginalText: Long ago, the guardian of this island hid  <1>TWO BRACELETS</1> in the <1>MINES</1> up above.

Text: 这些手镯就是把城市叫醒的<1>钥匙</1>。
OriginalText: These bracelets are the <1>KEY</1> to waking the city.

Text: 把它们找出来，并带来给我。
OriginalText: Find them, and bring them to me.

Text: 把那狗颈圈拿去给鬼长辈看。
OriginalText: Show that <1>DOG COLLAR</1> to the <1>GHOST ELDER</1>.
She will know how to use it.
There is a <1>WARP ROOM</1> up above, to the right.

Text: 你可以用它直接传送到她那里！
OriginalText: You can use it to reach her directly!

Text: 如果要叫醒城市，你得带两个手镯给我。
OriginalText: To wake the city, bring me <1>TWO BRACELETS</1>.

Text: 谢谢。我看到你有引发地震的能力。
OriginalText: Thank you. I see you have the power to create <1>EARTHQUAKES</1>.

Text: 请使用你的能力帮我找出我主人的手镯。
OriginalText: Please use your power to find my master’s <1>BRACELETS</1>.

Text: 你把手镯带来了！我可以闻闻看吗？
OriginalText: You brought the <1>BRACELETS</1>! May I sniff them?

Text: 可我却散发着谎言的味道。
OriginalText: But I reek of lies and deception.
...I am not truly a ghost dog.

Text: 我还活着时，是个守护精灵。
OriginalText: In life I was a Guardian Genie.

Text: 我的职责就是保护这岛屿。
OriginalText: My job was to protect this island.

Text: 但七海妖来的时候，我却无法拯救我的人民。
OriginalText: But when the <1>SEVEN SIRENS</1> came, I was unable to save my people.

Text: 我认为我把海妖永远关起来了，所以我把她们的电棒折成两段。
OriginalText: Thinking I’d trapped the Sirens for good, I took their <1>POWER ROD</1> and broke it into two parts.

Text: 我把它们藏在矿山里，只有我的震撼魔法能把它们找出来。
OriginalText: I hid the pieces in the mines where only my Quake Magic could find them.

Text: 这样，海妖从此以后就不能再开动她们的船了。
OriginalText: This way, the Sirens could never again <1>POWER THEIR VESSEL</1>.
You have learned the secret of this island.

Text: 现在，我会把<1>两个手镯</1>合起来，重新组成<1>电棒</1>。
OriginalText: Now, I will combine the <1>TWO BRACELETS</1> to form the <1>POWER ROD</1> once more.

Text: 虽然我把她们关起来了，可我没强到打败那些海妖。
OriginalText: Though I had them trapped, I was not powerful enough to defeat the Sirens.

Text: 我战斗输给了她们的头目，第七个海妖。
OriginalText: I battled their leader, the <1>SEVENTH SIREN</1> and lost.

Text: 我掉下去之前唯一能做的是把她的肉体夺走。
OriginalText: All I could do is rob her of her physical form before I fell.

Text: 许多年来，我一直作为鬼魂待在这里。
OriginalText: For many years I have remained down below as a <1>GHOST</1>.

Text: 在这期间，我只能无奈地看着海妖把我的人民诱向命运的深渊。
OriginalText: In all that time, I have watched helplessly as the Sirens lured my people down into the depths to meet their fate.

Text: 我希望你能终结这一切。
OriginalText: I want you to <1>PUT AN END</1> to this madness.

Text: 把那电棒拿去，重新启动海妖的船。驾驶它航向遥远的地方。
OriginalText: Take that <1>POWER ROD</1>, and re-activate the Siren’s <1>VESSEL</1>. Sail it away.

Text: 去往海妖无法伤害任何人的地方。
OriginalText: Take it someplace where the Sirens won’t be able to harm anyone ever again.

Text: 现在，我会继续做条癞皮狗。
OriginalText: Now, I will remain a mangy dog.

Text: 以目前的状态，这电棒是没法用的……
OriginalText: In its current state, the <1>POWER ROD</1> is useless.

Text: 你得想办法恢复电棒的电力……
OriginalText: You must <1>RESTORE POWER</1> to the rod somehow...

Text: …然后再带去我们上面的控制室！
OriginalText: ...And then, take it to the <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> directly above us!

Text: 也许有科学头脑的人可以协助你。
OriginalText: Perhaps a person with a scientific mind can lend assistance.

Text: 没有人知道那里到底有多少海妖！
OriginalText: There is no telling how many of the Sirens there truly are!
Please take it to the <1>CONTRL ROOM</1>.

Text: 根据你的<1>地图</1>，它在我们上面三层！
OriginalText: According to your <1>MAP</1>, it is three decks above us!

Text: 看来得有电才能开这个。
OriginalText: Looks like the power has to be on before this thing will open.

Text: 我听到声音，跟着他们过来。
OriginalText: I heard voices and followed them here.

Text: 可是他们现在好像消失了。
OriginalText: But they seem to have vanished.

Text: 有了这最终的能力，你就会成为<1>闪亮巨星半精灵</1>！
OriginalText: With this final power, you'll become a <1>SPECTACULAR SUPERSTAR SUPER GENIE</1>!
Just tell me when you're ready, ok?

Text: <1>震撼舞</1>能<1>撼动大地</1>！也能重创敌人！
OriginalText: The <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> can <1>SHIFT THE EARTH</1>! It also deals significant damage to enemies!

Text: （跳舞至图标出现，再按<IB action=Down/>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Down/> to activate the magic!)

Text: （跳舞至图标出现，再点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_quake scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_quake scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: <1>震撼舞</1>能<1>撼动大地</1>！也能重创敌人！
OriginalText: The <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> can <1>SHIFT THE EARTH</1>! It also deals significant damage to enemies!
Try using it in this room!
The <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> can move mountains! Give it a try!

Text: 我想你该把它们带给那只<1>鬼狗</1>！
OriginalText: I guess you should take them to that <1>GHOST DOG</1>!

Text: 你该把它们带给那只<1>癞皮鬼狗</1>！
OriginalText: Better take those to the <1>MANGY GHOST DOG</1>.
This spirit claims to know you!
She's the one who helped me find you!
Old one, it seems I owe you my very life!

Text: 其实我也许还能再帮助你们！
OriginalText: In fact I may be of more use still!

Text: 你说你还需要<1>最后一块融合石</1>？
OriginalText: You say you need <1>ONE LAST FUSION STONE</1>?

Text: 你知道能在哪里找到吗？
OriginalText: Do you know where we can find it?
At the bottom of the sea!

Text: 在那儿，你会遇到一位也许能帮你的人！
OriginalText: There you'll find someone who may be able to help!

Text: 前往<1>海底</1>，我确定你就能找到你所寻找的。
OriginalText: Travel to the <1>OCEAN FLOOR</1>, and I'm sure you'll find that which you seek.

Text: 为何不试试用<1>海蛙</1>的能力潜到更深的地方呢？
OriginalText: Why not try using that <1>FROG</1> ability to dive even deeper?

Text: 但我又找到了一块融合石！
OriginalText: But I did manage to find a Fusion Stone!
It was a gift from a Ghost Dog!

Text: 有人说这附近埋了<1>两个手镯</1>。
OriginalText: It said there were <1>TWO BRACELETS</1> buried around here.

Text: 那我知道我该怎么帮你了。
OriginalText: In that case I know just how to help.
Are you ready to do this?

Text: 我好像触发了某种安全装置。
OriginalText: I must have tripped some kind of security device.

Text: 我是跟着一个奇怪的能源读数来到这房间的。
OriginalText: I was following a strange energy reading that lead me to this room.

Text: 似乎是来自墙里的这个小端口。
OriginalText: It seems to be coming from this small port in the wall.

Text: 如果有正确的工具，我们也许就能从这端口<1>虹吸能源</1>出来！
OriginalText: Huh. With the right tool, we could <1>SIPHON ENERGY</1> from here!

Text: 哦，我可以看看那没电的电棒吗？
OriginalText: Oh! Can I see that unpowered <1>ROD</1>?

Text: 如果你需要我的<1>科学头脑</1>，尽管来找我！
OriginalText: Come see me if you need the help of my <1>SCIENTIFIC MIND</1>!

Text: 这电棒看起来正好匹配这个端口！
OriginalText: This rod looks like it would fit perfectly!

Text: 这会不会是某种燃料容器呢？
OriginalText: Could it be some kind of fuel container?
Let's plug it in and find out, shall we?

Text: 电棒充满了能量，正在脉动着！
OriginalText: That rod is now pulsing with an enormous amount of power!

Text: 不骗你。非常非常多能量！
OriginalText: I'm not kidding. That's a lot of juice!

Text: 我们扫描注意到了<1>深海区</1>有一间<1>控制室</1>。
OriginalText: Our scans picked up a <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> in the <1>DEEP SEA</1> zone.

Text: 也许你应该把电棒带去那儿！
OriginalText: Perhaps you should take the power rod there!

Text: 我会在你的<1>地图</1>上标出位置!
OriginalText: I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!

Text: 我们扫描注意到了<1>深海区</1>有一间<1>控制室</1>。
OriginalText: Our scans picked up a <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> in the <1>DEEP SEA</1> zone.

Text: 也许你应该把电棒带去那儿！
OriginalText: Perhaps you should take the power rod there!

Text: 救命！我好像触发了某种安全装置！我被困住了！
OriginalText: Help! I seem to have tripped some sort of security device! I'm stuck!
Stay put! I'll get you out!

Text: 当核心电力达到最大容量时…
OriginalText: When the Core Power reaches its max capacity...
...the release valve needs to be opened.

Text: 这样，电力才能往城市继续流。
OriginalText: That way the energy can flow out into the rest of the city.

Text: 如果释放阀没有及时打开……
OriginalText: If the valve isn't opened by the time the Core goes critical...
So you need to find that switch...
Are you ready to do this?
Ok, let me know when you're ready.

Text: 我和波罗会在这里控制电流。
OriginalText: Bolo and I will stay here to regulate the energy flow.

Text: 找到控制开关，找到烂脑瓜……
OriginalText: Find that control switch, grab Rotty...

Text: 看起来这就是天天在说的开关！
OriginalText: This looks like the switch Sky was taking about!

Text: 一定有什么方法能让<1>电力</1>进到这控制台！
OriginalText: There must be some way get <1>ELECTRICITY</1> to this control panel!
Activate the Power Core release valve?
Risky! You need to turn back!

Text: 我离目标已经这么近了！
我的人很快就会完成修理。
OriginalText: Soon my men will complete their repairs.

Text: 然后这城市的力量就会属于我！
OriginalText: And the power of this city will belong to me!
Risky Boots, Queen of the Seven Seas!

Text: 这下糟了！我得快想办法！
OriginalText: This can't be good! I've got to do something!

Text: 而你为什么假装成半精灵呢？
OriginalText: And why were you pretending to be a Half-Genie?
You planned to go on vacation and leave me behind!

Text: 所以我藏在你的行李箱里偷渡过来了！
OriginalText: So I hid in the luggage and stowed away!

Text: 而我打扮成精灵是为了能参加好玩的活动！
OriginalText: And I dressed like a genie so I'd be included in the fun stuff!

Text: 我没邀请你是因为找不到你。
OriginalText: I didn't invite you because I couldn't find you.

Text: 大概就是因为你藏在我行李箱里！
OriginalText: Probably because you were hiding in the luggage!
That does kind of make sense!

Text: 哇，你其实有打算要邀请我啊！
OriginalText: Awwww, you were going to invite me after all!

Text: 是啊，不过……我以后可能会重新考虑一下了！
OriginalText: Yeah, well... I'll probably reconsider in the future!

Text: 那硬币上有<1>喷射章鱼</1>的符号！
OriginalText: That coin bears the mark of a <1>JET OCTO</1>!

Text: 喷射章鱼是岛上的稀有生物。
OriginalText: Jet Octos are rare creatures that inhabit this island.

Text: 他们不会游泳，但能喷射墨汽在空中飞翔。
OriginalText: They can’t swim, but they can boost through the air on jets of ink vapor.

Text: 也许你能使用它的能力去找出这地方的<1>邪恶之源</1>！
OriginalText: Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Jump/>就能二段或三段跳！试试看吧！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Jump/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中点按<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3>来二段或三段跳！试试看！
OriginalText: Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3> button in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Jump/>就能二段或三段跳！试试看吧！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Jump/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中点按<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3>来二段或三段跳！试试看！
OriginalText: Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3> button in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 这是什么？看来好像缺了一块东西。
OriginalText: What is this? Looks like a piece is missing.

Text: 这控制台有个圆形的开口。
OriginalText: There is a circular opening in this panel.

Text: 我是否应该插进电棒呢？

OriginalText: Shantae, is that your voice I hear?

Text: 刚刚有奇怪的机器从地上升出来！
OriginalText: A strange machine just rose up from the ground!
Almost knocked me right off my feet!

Text: 嗯…它好像连着地下的城市。
OriginalText: Hmm... seems to be connected to the city below.

Text: 某种控制台，上面有圆形的显示屏。
OriginalText: Some kind of control console with a round display.
I'm using it to communicate with you.

Text: 我在这下面也看到类似的东西！
OriginalText: I'm looking at something similar down here!
The city isn't a city at all.

Text: 我猜这艘船就是险险一直以来的目标！
OriginalText: I think this ship is what Risky has been after all along!
Rottytops is trapped down here, too!

Text: 我得进行<1>最后一个救援任务</1>！
OriginalText: I need to mount <1>ONE LAST RESCUE</1>!

Text: 我在我这的控制台上看到了气闸的图像。
OriginalText: I can see an image of an airlock on my panel.
Maybe there's a way to open it!

Text: 你那有没有开关或者控制杆？
OriginalText: Is there a switch or lever on your side?
Ok. Now, before you pull it...
WHOOAAAHH! IT IS CRUSHING MY BONES!
Just kidding. But, that could have really happened!

Text: 停泊口开了，我会送人过来。
OriginalText: According to my screen, you have just opened some sort of docking bay.
I will send help to you. Head to the city's lowest point!

Text: 这控制台突然冒了出来！
OriginalText: This Control Panel popped up out of nowhere!

Text: 我想也许那些<1>科学家</1>能帮助你解开这奥秘……
OriginalText: I bet those <1>SCIENTISTS</1> could help solve this mystery...
Looks like the power is on!

Text: 你们大家怎么都在这里？
OriginalText: What are you all doing down here?

Text: 你叔叔请求我们立即把你的朋友带来这里！
OriginalText: Your uncle requested that we bring your friends here at once!

Text: 他们有个非常重要的任务！
OriginalText: They have a very important mission!

Text: 是的，按照你叔叔，秘密克先生说的……
OriginalText: Yes, according to your uncle, Mister Mimic...

Text: 你把岛屿底下的<1>能量核心</1>重新启动了。
OriginalText: Whatever you did reactivated the <1>POWER CORE</1> beneath this island.

Text: 很快就会过热到危险的地步！
OriginalText: It will soon heat up to dangerous levels!
I'm sorry, but I had to!

Text: 这是救出烂脑瓜的唯一机会！
OriginalText: It's my only chance to save Rotty!
Ugh! Do not get me started about Rottytops!

Text: 我猜这一切都是她的错！
OriginalText: I'm sure this is all her fault, somehow!

Text: 我很抱歉把你们三个拖进这团乱麻！
OriginalText: I'm sorry I got you three mixed up in all this!

Text: 是的！我们才不会错过呢！
OriginalText: Yes! We wouldn't miss this for the world!

Text: 光站在这里就已经是梦想成真了！
OriginalText: Just standing here is a dream come true!
Best to catch up to your friends!

Text: 幸好你们都安全出来了！
OriginalText: I'm so glad you all made it out safely!

Text: 我猜你们都想我了，是吗？
OriginalText: Bet you guys missed me, huh?
Boy, that <1>OCTO FORM</1> sure came in handy!
YOU'VE GOT SOME EXPLAINING TO DO!!!
WHAT EXACTLY WAS THAT BACK THERE?!!
Don't you give me that malarkey!

Text: 在脑液里舒展着的大美女？！
OriginalText: RADICAL HOT BABE CHILLIN’ OUT IN THE BRAIN JUICE?!?
Why does that sound so familiar?
And that makes YOU the BAD GUY!

Text: 你怎么不炸成那种你最喜欢的……
OriginalText: Why don't you just explode into one of those huge, white...
...screen clearing blasts that you love so much!

Text: 说实在的，你怎么不跟全屏爆炸结婚呢！
OriginalText: In fact, why don't you and the Screen Clearing Blast get married!

Text: 这样你就能生出全屏爆炸娃娃来！
OriginalText: So you can have Screen Clearing Blast BABIES!

Text: 然后去一个永远在全屏爆炸的…
OriginalText: And go live on a farm that's constantly EXPLODING...

Text: 这不是最后一次见面，小姐！
OriginalText: You haven't seen the last of me, lady!

Text: 好吧，我得去接我姐姐的孩子了。
OriginalText: Anyhoo, I gotta go pick up my sister's kids.

Text: 如果你看到他们，请告诉我！
OriginalText: Let me know if you see any of 'em!
We've got to get aboard the <1>METAL FISH</1>, fast!

Text: 趁海妖还没发现她们的主控系统已经恢复上线了！
OriginalText: Before those Sirens realize that their main control systems are back on line!
I just want to say that...

Text: 我真的很抱歉偷渡过来。
OriginalText: I'm really sorry about stowing away.

Text: 我早该知道你会邀请我的。
OriginalText: I should have known you'd invite me.

Text: 你可以待会儿再道歉，烂脑瓜。
你能从你进来的路出去吗？
OriginalText: Can you get out the way you came in?

Text: 你们快搭上铁鱼逃出去吧！
OriginalText: You guys take the Metal Fish and get out of here!

Text: 那些塔从地上升了起来！
OriginalText: Those towers rose up right out of the ground!

Text: 这就是我之前在讲的控制台！
OriginalText: And this is the control panel I was talking about before!

Text: 我按了上面每一个按钮，但什么也发生！
OriginalText: I pushed every button on it, but nothing happened!

Text: 你再按一次我就把你绑起来！
OriginalText: Touch it again and I’ll hogtie you!

Text: 这一切都是靴子险险做的！
她利用我恢复了控制系统的电力。
OriginalText: She tricked me into restoring power to the control systems.

Text: 而她现在在用这些<1>塔</1>来为<1>引擎</1>充电！
OriginalText: And now she's using these <1>TOWERS</1> to power up the <1>ENGINES</1>!

Text: 沉没城市怎么会需要引擎呢？
OriginalText: Why would a sunken city need engines?

Text: 因为这根本不是一座城市！
OriginalText: Because this city isn't a city at all!

Text: 是的！而靴子险险想给它充电把它开走！
OriginalText: Yes! And <1>RISKY BOOTS</1> is trying to power it up and sail away with it!

Text: 难以置信！岛屿底下怎么有一艘船呢？
OriginalText: Unthinkable! How would a ship come to be stuck beneath the island?

Text: 不管它是怎么到那的，开动这艘船对这岛屿来说可不是好事。
OriginalText: However it got there, moving this ship can't be good for the health of this island.
When the ship tears free of the earth...
...it won't be long before the ship reaches <1>FULL POWER</1>.

Text: 现状是，香缇一个人有我们全部的魔法能力！
